titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship for October 1, 2013, through September 30, 2014, and October 1, 2014, through February 28, 2015.

An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship for October 1, 2013, through September 30, 2014, and October 1, 2014, through February 28, 2015.

action.text: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Landrieu. Without written report.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

bill.summary: Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship for the 113th Congress.
